name: echo
description: While writeOutput writes to the page-output stream, this function writes to the main response buffer

params.name: string
params.description: String to be written to the output buffer

examples.title: Complex Data Example
examples.description: Note that complex objects will not automatically be converted to String, as with System.out.println in Java.
